    • findSource

      @NotNull public @NotNull FallingBackMiniMessageSource findSource(@NotNull @NotNull Locale locale)
      Description copied from interface: Localization
      Gets the MessageSource of the specified Locale as FallingBackMessageSource.

      The returned FallingBackMessageSource will fall back to Localization.defaultSource().

      Parameters:
      locale - the Locale to get
      Returns:
      the MessageSource of the specified Locale as FallingBackMessageSource
